```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
library(dslabs)
library(tidyverse)
gapminder
```

```{r include=FALSE}
gap2011 <- gapminder %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  filter(year == 2011)
```

## Life Expectancy Data Explore

```{r}
ggplot(data=gap2011, aes(x=gdp/population, y=life_expectancy, size=population, color=continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlab("Per Capita GDP") +
  ylab("Life Expectancy")
```




```{r}
ggplot(data = gap2011, aes(x = continent, y = life_expectancy)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color=continent)) +
  xlab("Continent") +
  ylab("Life Expectancy")
```
